name: Pestolence (Jam Edition)
description: (My Apologies if UI is broken, If the sign on he first scene is too small for your resolution press Q to play. Click Button on lose screen to try again)Basic yet difficult game about resource management made for the Lost Relic Game Jam.  use shops that bring you gold so you can increase your food output with farms or increase your population with houses, but beware of the plague. As your population increases a sickness will begin to fester, but fear not because the plague doctors are here to help with their totally accurate sciences and false sense of hope. But as long as you don't acquire too much infection or run out of food,  you'll be just alright.
